item.title: How Mass Notification Systems Keep Hospitals Operational During Severe Weather
item.description: From hurricanes to blizzards, severe weather events can present significant challenges for hospital operations, jeopardizing patient care and compromising safety. To remain operational and provide critical and life-saving care during these challenging weather events, hospital administrators must implement a comprehensive critical incident strategy bolstered by mass notification systems. Mass notification systems help ensure uninterrupted operations, safeguard patients and staff and maintain effective communication in the face of logistical challenges.
